message: I propose a fair and equitable split.  I take the lion's share because I'm the one making the offer, but I'm confident you'll see the wisdom in it!
I think 60/40 is a fair split, considering I'm taking a larger share this time. Your turn to decide!
I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still think a 70/30 split is fair. Let's end this before inflation eats away at our gains!
Let's meet in the middle and split it 50/50. No more negotiating, let's end this!
